title: looking for bronze tier under 3 player
body:
i will take you to silver

add me ryanrules7

replies.body: i will take you to bronze
you have to be 13+ to play the game.
Haha iv been playing since the beta. There's some you just can't help.

Im bronze 3, would be happy to climb. Depends how serious you take the game though?
I'm serious enough about the game to always wanna win... but besides that if you're the type to get tilted or angry at my mistakes perhaps im not the right candidate. Im very cruisy about this game, a little too cruisy for some haha
lol waht made you do this, s5 diamond.. lul
